mojo.description: Attempts to clean all NST files associated with the specified build ID.

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: buildId
parameter.description: Specifies the SCA build ID. The default is project artifact ID and version. In aggregate mode, the top level project artifact ID and version is used for all modules.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA runs in debug mode. This can be useful for troubleshooting.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.description: Specifies the log file produced by SCA.

parameter.name: maxHeap
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum heap size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA writes minimal messages to the console.

parameter.name: scaCleanFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during SCA clean.

parameter.name: scaFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any SCA processing.

parameter.name: scaProjectRoot
parameter.description: Specifies the sourceanalyzer project root directory. Associated with com.fortify.sca.ProjectRoot SCA property

parameter.name: sourceanalyzer
parameter.description: Location of the sourceanalyzer executable. Defaults to sourceanalyzer which runs the version on the PATH or fails if none exists.

parameter.name: stackSize
parameter.description: Specifies the thread stack size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA sends verbose status messages to the console.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA prints the version to the console.

mojo.description: Exports a mobile build session for the specified build ID.

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: buildId
parameter.description: Specifies the SCA build ID. The default is project artifact ID and version. In aggregate mode, the top level project artifact ID and version is used for all modules.

parameter.name: buildSessionFile
parameter.description: Location and name of the generated build session file.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA runs in debug mode. This can be useful for troubleshooting.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.description: Specifies the log file that is produced by Fortify SCA.

parameter.name: maxHeap
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum heap size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA writes minimal messages to the console.

parameter.name: scaExportFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during SCA mobile build session export.

parameter.name: scaFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any SCA processing.

parameter.name: scaProjectRoot
parameter.description: Specifies the sourceanalyzer project root directory. Associated with com.fortify.sca.ProjectRoot SCA property

parameter.name: sourceanalyzer
parameter.description: Location of the sourceanalyzer executable. Defaults to sourceanalyzer which runs the version on the PATH or fails if none exists.

parameter.name: stackSize
parameter.description: Specifies the thread stack size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA sends verbose status messages to the console.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA prints the version to the console.

mojo.description:
Display help information on sca-maven-plugin.
Call mvn sca:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Performs analysis for the specified build ID.

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: buildId
parameter.description: Specifies the SCA build ID. The default is project artifact ID and version. In aggregate mode, the top level project artifact ID and version is used for all modules.

parameter.name: buildLabel
parameter.description: Specifies build label included in the generated FPR.

parameter.name: buildProject
parameter.description: Specifies build project name included in the generated FPR.

parameter.name: buildVersion
parameter.description: Specifies the build version included in the generated FPR.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA runs in debug mode. This can be useful for troubleshooting.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Specifies filter file to use during the scan.

parameter.name: findbugs
parameter.description: If set to true, includes FindBugs analysis results in the final report.

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.description: Specifies the log file that is produced by SCA.

parameter.name: maxHeap
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum heap size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: numOfWorkerThreads
parameter.description: Specifies the number of worker threads for parallel analysis.

parameter.name: quickScan
parameter.description: If set to true, scans the project in Quick Scan Mode (uses the fortifysca-quickscan.properties file). By default, this scan only searches for high-confidence, high-severity issues.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA writes minimal messages to the console.

parameter.name: renderSources
parameter.description: If set to true, source files are included in the FPR file.

parameter.name: resultsFile
parameter.description: Location and name of the generated FPR file. By default, top level project artifact ID and version is used for aggregate mode. The current project artifact ID and version is used for individual mode.

parameter.name: rules
parameter.description: Speficies rules used during a scan. Use an outer <rules> tag followed by nested <rule> tags to specify one or more rules files to use during the scan.

parameter.name: scaFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any SCA processing.

parameter.name: scaProjectRoot
parameter.description: Specifies the sourceanalyzer project root directory. Associated with com.fortify.sca.ProjectRoot SCA property

parameter.name: scaScanFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during the SCA scan.

parameter.name: sourceanalyzer
parameter.description: Location of the sourceanalyzer executable. Defaults to sourceanalyzer which runs the version on the PATH or fails if none exists.

parameter.name: stackSize
parameter.description: Specifies the thread stack size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA sends verbose status messages to the console.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA prints the version to the console.

mojo.description: Performs the ScanCentral for the specified build ID or mobile build session.

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: buildId
parameter.description: Specifies the SCA build ID. The default is project artifact ID and version. In aggregate mode, the top level project artifact ID and version is used for all modules.

parameter.name: buildLabel
parameter.description: Build Label inserted in to generated FPR.

parameter.name: buildProject
parameter.description: Build Project Name inserted in to generated FPR.

parameter.name: buildSessionFile
parameter.description: Location and name of the existing mobile build session to be uploaded to the ScanCentral controller.

parameter.name: buildSessionProjectRoot
parameter.description: Specifies project directory for the mobile build session export.

parameter.name: buildVersion
parameter.description: Build Version inserted in to generated FPR.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA runs in debug mode. This can be useful for troubleshooting.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: emailAddress
parameter.description: Specifies an email address for job status notification.

parameter.name: enableBlock
parameter.description: If set to true, ScanCentral client waits for job to complete and download the results.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Specifies the location and name of the filter file to use during the scan (repeatable).

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: fortifyclient
parameter.description: Specifies the location of the fortifyclient executable. Defaults to fortifyclient that runs the version on the PATH. Upload fails if none exists.

parameter.name: issueTemplate
parameter.description: Specifies Issue Template to be applied to the ScanCentral.

parameter.name: logFile
parameter.description: Specifies the location and name of the log file produced by the ScanCentral client.

parameter.name: maxHeap
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum heap size of the JVM that runs SCA.

parameter.name: numOfWorkerThreads
parameter.description: Specify the number of worker threads for parallel analysis.

parameter.name: overwrite
parameter.description: If set to true, the existing FPR or log file might be overwritten with new data.

parameter.name: quickScan
parameter.description: If set to true, scans the project in Quick Scan Mode (uses the fortifysca-quickscan.properties file). By default, this scan only searches for high-confidence, high-severity issues.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.description: If set true, SCA writes minimal message to the console.

parameter.name: renderSources
parameter.description: If set to true, source files are included in the FPR file.

parameter.name: resultsFile
parameter.description: Specifies the location and name of the FPR file to retrieve.

parameter.name: rules
parameter.description: Specifies the custom rule file/directory to use.

parameter.name: scanCentralFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any ScanCentral processing.

parameter.name: scanCentralStartFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during the ScanCentral start.

parameter.name: scancentral
parameter.description: Location of the ScanCentral client executable. Defaults to ScanCentral which runs the version on the PATH or fails if none exists.

parameter.name: scancentralCtrlUrl
parameter.description: Specifies the URL of the ScanCentral controller.

parameter.name: sscApplicationName
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC application name. Note that this must be supplied in conjunction with sscApplicationVersion.

parameter.name: sscApplicationVersion
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC application version. Note that this must be supplied in conjunction with sscApplicationName.

parameter.name: sscApplicationVersionId
parameter.description: Specifies the Application Version ID of the SSC application. Note that sscApplicationVersionId overrides sscApplicationName and sscApplicationVersion combinations if supplied.

parameter.name: sscScanCentralCtrlToken
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC ScanCentralCtrlToken to use when attempting to interact with the ScanCentral controller. To enable SSC Integrated Mode, uploadToSSC must be true.

parameter.name: sscUploadToken
parameter.description: AnalysisUploadToken to use when attempting to upload fpr files to SSC.

parameter.name: sscUrl
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC URL to interact with ScanCentral controller. To enable SSC Integrated Mode, uploadToSSC must be true. If sscUrl is specified, sscScanCentralCtrlToken must also be specified.

parameter.name: stackSize
parameter.description: Specifies the thread stack size of JVM that runs SCA.

parameter.name: uploadToSSC
parameter.description: If set to true, the ScanCentral controller uploads the analysis results to SSC. Note that this must be supplied in conjunction with sscApplicationVersionId, or sscApplicationName and sscApplicationVersion combinations.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: IIf set to true, SCA sends verbose status messages to the console.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA prints the version to the console.

mojo.description: Translate files in the specified project to NST files.

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: buildId
parameter.description: Specifies the SCA build ID. The default is project artifact ID and version. In aggregate mode, the top level project artifact ID and version is used for all modules.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA runs in debug mode. This can be useful for troubleshooting.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: Specifies the source file encoding type. This is same as the javac encoding option.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: Specifies file paths to exclude from translation.

parameter.name: extraClassPathString
parameter.description: Specifies an additional class path used as the argument of the SCA -cp option. This is in addition to dependencies worked out from the pom. This should be a correctly formed and separated list of paths for the underlying system. No processing is done on this string other than concatenation. This is potentially useful for JSP compilation.

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.description: Specifies log file produced by sourceanalzer.

parameter.name: maxHeap
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum heap size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA writes minimal messages to the console.

parameter.name: scaFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any SCA processing.

parameter.name: scaProjectRoot
parameter.description: Specifies the sourceanalyzer project root directory. Associated with com.fortify.sca.ProjectRoot SCA property

parameter.name: scaTranslateFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during the SCA translation.

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: If set to true, tests are not included in the translation.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Specifies the JDK version that for which the Java code is written. This is same as the javac source option. Valid values for the version are 1.7, 1.8, 1.9, 10, 11, 12, 13 and 14.

parameter.name: sourcePath
parameter.description: Specifies the directory that contains the source files to use for name resolution. These files are not analyzed.

parameter.name: sourceanalyzer
parameter.description: Location of the sourceanalyzer executable. Defaults to sourceanalyzer which runs the version on the PATH or fails if none exists.

parameter.name: sqlType
parameter.description: Specifies the SQL type: PLSQL or TSQL.

parameter.name: stackSize
parameter.description: Specifies the thread stack size of JVM which runs SCA.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA sends verbose status messages to the console.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: If set to true, SCA prints the version to the console.

mojo.description: Uploads analysis results to Software Security Center (SSC).

parameter.name: aggregate
parameter.description: If set to true, aggregate mode is enabled.

parameter.name: dontRunSCA
parameter.description: If set to true, generates SCA commands to run, but does not actually run them.

parameter.name: fortifyWorkingDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the Fortify working directory. Associated with com.fortify.WorkingDirectory property

parameter.name: fortifyclient
parameter.description: Specifies the location of the fortifyclient executable. Defaults to fortifyclient that runs the version on the PATH. Upload fails if none exists.

parameter.name: resultsFile
parameter.description: Specifies the file path to the FPR file to upload. By default, project artifact ID - version are used.

parameter.name: scaFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during any SCA processing.

parameter.name: scaUploadFailOnError
parameter.description: If set to true, the build fails if errors occur during the upload.

parameter.name: sscApplicationName
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC application name. Note that this must be supplied in conjunction with sscApplicationVersion.

parameter.name: sscApplicationVersion
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC application version. Note that this must be supplied in conjunction with sscApplicationName.

parameter.name: sscApplicationVersionId
parameter.description: Specifies the Application Version ID of the SSC application. Note that sscApplicationVersionId overrides sscApplicationName and sscApplicationVersion combinations if supplied.

parameter.name: sscUploadToken
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC AnalysisUploadToken to use when attempting to upload the FPR to Software Security Center (SSC).

parameter.name: sscUrl
parameter.description: Specifies the SSC URL to interact with during the upload actions.
